content: Young musicians inspired by Elton John include which British singer-songwriter who collaborated with him on the song 'Tiny Dancer' at the Grammy Awards?

I believe you're referring to Ed Sheeran, who performed a duet with Elton John on 'Tiny Dancer' at the 56th Annual Grammy Awards in 2014. This collaboration showcased the influence of Elton John on younger generations of musicians like Ed Sheeran.
